short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Equalize audio, adjust volume, and toggle between mono and stereo within your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An audio equalizer for your browser! 

Includes:
-12-band parametric EQ
-Up to 3x volume
-Toggle between stereo and mono

Permissions:
-"Read and change all your data on the websites you visit": Allows the extension to modify the audio to your needs.
